text: Me akar aning mɨkemezimɨn mɨngarim gɨfoghasa amuvɨra ikia, egha a gɨfo a guizbangɨra. Egha me tememɨn aning agurazɨma aning areme. Egha atrivim kamaghɨn uan ingangarir gumazibav gɨa ghaze, “Bizir otozir kam, e uan gavmanɨn akɨnafarimɨn aven eghaghanimɨn mɨn an osirigh.” Ezɨ me atrivimɨn damazimɨn a mɨkemezɨ moghɨrama ami.
